_config:table.definition: CREATE TABLE TI_CGPUB_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# (CATGROUP_ID BIGINT NOT NULL, PUBLISHED INTEGER, PRIMARY KEY (CATGROUP_ID))
_config:table.name: TI_CGPUB_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#

_config:query.sql: SELECT C.CATGROUP_ID, COALESCE(P2.UNPUBLISHED, P1.PUBLISHED) AS PUBLISHED FROM CATGROUP C LEFT JOIN (SELECT C1.CATGROUP_ID, 1 PUBLISHED FROM CATGROUP C1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT CD1.CATGROUP_ID FROM CATGRPDESC CD1 WHERE CD1.CATGROUP_ID = C1.CATGROUP_ID AND CD1.PUBLISHED = 1)) AS P1 ON (C.CATGROUP_ID = P1.CATGROUP_ID) LEFT JOIN (SELECT C2.CATGROUP_ID, 0 UNPUBLISHED FROM CATGROUP C2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT CD2.CATGROUP_ID FROM CATGRPDESC CD2 WHERE CD2.CATGROUP_ID = C2.CATGROUP_ID AND CD2.PUBLISHED = 0)) AS P2 ON (C.CATGROUP_ID = P2.CATGROUP_ID)

_config:table.definition: CREATE TABLE TI_CEPUB_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# (CATENTRY_ID BIGINT NOT NULL, PUBLISHED INTEGER, PRIMARY KEY (CATENTRY_ID))
_config:table.name: TI_CEPUB_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#

_config:query.sql: (SELECT DISTINCT CD.CATENTRY_ID, 0 PUBLISHED FROM CATENTDESC CD, TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# C WHERE CD.CATENTRY_ID = C.CATENTRY_ID AND CD.PUBLISHED = 0) UNION ALL (SELECT TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#.CATENTRY_ID, 1 PUBLISHED FROM TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# WHERE TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#.CATENTRY_ID NOT IN (SELECT CD.CATENTRY_ID FROM CATENTDESC CD, TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# C WHERE CD.CATENTRY_ID = C.CATENTRY_ID AND CD.PUBLISHED = 0))
